SEARCH
Package Controller

Class HRSController

java.lang.Object
Controller.HRSController
public class HRSController extends Object
The HotelReservationSystem class manages the operations related to hotel reservations. This allows creating hotels, viewing hotel details, managing hotel properties, and simulating bookings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HRSController()
    Constructs a new HotelReservationSystem with an empty list of hotels.

      hotelName - is the name of the hotel that the room belongs to
      roomName - is the name of the room that the reservation belongs to
      dateInput - is the date or day that will be modified

      Returns:
      true if modification of price on date is successful, otherwise false

      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel to check
      roomType - the type of room to check

      Returns:

    • bookRoom

      public boolean bookRoom(String hotelName, String guestName, String roomType, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String discountCode)
      Books a room in a specified hotel for a guest.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel where the room is to be booked.
      guestName - the name of the guest for whom the room is to be booked.
      roomType - the type of room to be booked.
      checkInDate - the check-in date for the booking.
      checkOutDate - the check-out date for the booking.
      discountCode - the discount code for the booking.
      Returns:
      true if the room was successfully booked, otherwise returns false.

    • isDiscountCodeValid

      public boolean isDiscountCodeValid(String discountCode)
      Checks if the provided discount code is valid.
      Parameters:
      discountCode - A string representing the discount code to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the discount code is one of the predefined valid codes

    • isDiscountApplied

      public boolean isDiscountApplied(HashMap<String,String> reservationToBeMade, String discountCode)
      Checks if the discount code is applied to the reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationToBeMade - the reservation to be made
      discountCode - the discount code to be applied
      Returns:
      true if the discount code is applied, otherwise false

    • createTemporaryReservation

      public HashMap<String,String> createTemporaryReservation(String hotelName, String roomType, String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate, String discountCode)
      Creates a temporary reservation for a guest.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel where the room is to be booked
      roomType - the type of room to be booked
      guestName - the name of the guest for whom the room is to be booked
      checkInDate - the check-in date for the booking
      checkOutDate - the check-out date for the booking
      discountCode - the discount code for the booking
      Returns:
      a HashMap information of the created temporary reservation, otherwise null
